data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in Hacken.
In the minute 10, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping.
Throw-in for Norrkoping close to the penalty box.
At Bravida Arena, Hacken are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 16, Hacken take a 1-0 lead thanks to Alexander Soderlund.
Godswill Ekpolo with an assist there.
Free kick Norrkoping.
In the minute 18, Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Can Norrkoping get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Norrkoping at Bravida Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 26, Glenn Nyberg blows against Norrkoping's Rasmus Lauritsen for offside.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Norrkoping.
Hacken's Daleho Irandust misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 27, Norrkoping have a goal kick.
Norrkoping push upfield but Glenn Nyberg quickly pulls them for offside.
Hacken's Daleho Irandust is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Jonathan Levi of Norrkoping smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Norrkoping.
Hacken are coming forward and Leonard Zuta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 37, Glenn Nyberg awards Norrkoping a goal kick.
The match at Bravida Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Isak Pettersson, who is down injured.
Norrkoping's Isak Pettersson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 39, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Norrkoping.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 42, Norrkoping surge into the attack at Bravida Arena but Christoffer Nymanâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Hacken throw-in in Norrkoping's half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Norrkoping at Bravida Arena.
Norrkoping to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Gothenburg.
In the minute 45, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
The first-half has come to a close in Gothenburg.
The second half has started at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 46, Andreas Alm is making the team's first substitution at Bravida Arena with Viktor Lundberg replacing Daleho Irandust.
The away team have replaced Andreas Blomqvist with Linus Hallenius. This is the first substitution made today by Jens Gustafsson.
Jens Gustafsson (Norrkoping) is making a second substitution, with Sead Haksabanovic replacing Linus Wahlqvist.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Hacken.
Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
In Gothenburg, Christoffer Nyman (Norrkoping) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 49, Glenn Nyberg awards Hacken a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
Throw-in for Norrkoping in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 53, In Gothenburg Hacken drive forward through Viktor Lundberg. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In Gothenburg, Hacken push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 56, Norrkoping have a dangerous throw-in.
Hacken needs to be cautious. Norrkoping have an attacking throw-in.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Hacken.
He's off! Filip Dagerstal is shown a red card.
Hacken's Joona Toivio gets in a shot on goal at Bravida Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 61, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Viktor Lundberg for Hacken is whistled offside.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Can Hacken capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Norrkoping's half?
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 63, Goal! Hacken extend their lead to 2-0 through Alexander Soderlund.
Great play from Leonard Zuta to set up the goal.
Free kick Norrkoping.
In the minute 65, Gustaf Nilsson is replacing Alexander Soderlund for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jonathan Levi for Norrkoping who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jonathan Levi (Norrkoping) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Pontus Almqvist.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ishaq Abdulrazak is replacing Christoffer Nyman for the away team.
Hacken have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Norrkoping goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Hacken, close to Norrkoping's area.
In the minute 73, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping in their own half.
The home team replace Patrik Walemark with Adam Andersson.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping in their own half.
Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Viktor Lundberg is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Hacken's Ahmed Yasin breaks free at Bravida Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Norrkoping goal kick.
Viktor Lundberg for Hacken is back on the field again.
Gustaf Nilsson of Hacken gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
Hacken's Ahmed Yasin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Norrkoping defender.
Throw-in for Norrkoping in their own half.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hacken's Adam Andersson is on target but unsuccessful.
Hacken's Viktor Lundberg gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 87, Glenn Nyberg awards Norrkoping a goal kick.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Norrkoping are back in the match in Gothenburg. Rasmus Lauritsen has scored to make it 2-1.
Sead Haksabanovic instrumental with a fine assist.
Hacken make their fourth substitution with Johan Hammar replacing Ahmed Yasin.
At Bravida Arena, Linus Hallenius has been yellow-carded for the away team.
